targets.expr: sum by(method) (rate(http_requests_total{code=~"4..", pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method", path=~"$path"}[5m])) / sum by(method) (rate(http_requests_total{pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method", path=~"$path"}[5m]))

sum by(method) (rate(http_requests_total{code=~"5..", pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method", path=~"$path"}[5m])) / sum by(method) (rate(http_requests_total{pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method", path=~"$path"}[5m]))

targets.legendFormat: bytes of memory are used for other runtime allocations {pod={{kubernetes_pod_name}}}

panels.description: shows how many heap objects are allocated. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to objects allocated/s.
panels.title: Rate of Objects Allocated

panels.title: Rate of a Pointer Dereferences
